mapper.select: select count(*) from scrap WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE FOLLOW_NO = #{member_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bcomment WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

SELECT F.FOLLOW_DATE, F.MEMBER_NICK AS FOLLOW_NICK, F.FOLLOW_NO, M.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK FROM follow F INNER JOIN member M ON F.FOLLOW_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE F.FOLLOW_NO = #{member_no} OR F.FOLLOWING_MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ORDER BY FOLLOW_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE, S.BOARD_NO, S.MEMBER_NICK, S.SCRAP_DATE, S.SCRAP_NO
FROM scrap S INNER JOIN board B ON B.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO
WHERE S.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
ORDER BY SCRAP_DATE DESC
